text: FDG may refer to: * Democratic Forces of Guiana (French: '), a political party in French Guiana * Fluorodeoxyglucose (18F) * Fluid dynamic gauge * Fording Canadian Coal Trust, a defunct Canadian trust * Friedrich-Dessauer-Gymnasium, Frankfurt, a school in Germany * Functional discourse grammar * Left Front (France) or Front de gauche, an electoral federation
title: FDG
